doc.previous: In addition Harvard intends to relocate the Harvard Graduate School of Education and the Harvard School of Public Health to Allston The university also plans to construct several new undergraduate and graduate student housing centers in Allston and it is considering large scale museums and performing arts complexes as well Unfortunately the large drop in endowment has halted these plans for now when
